About

Iâ€™m an PhD candidate in the Kim Jaechul Graduate School of AI at Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST AI), advised by Prof. Se-young Yun. Prior to beginning of my PhD course, I worked as a research engineer at Samsung Heavy Industires. I recieved an M.S. in Ocean system engieerning from KAIST under the supervision of Prof. Hyun Chung and B.S in Industrial engineering at Konkuk University. My research interests focus on meta-learning, bayesian non-parameteric models, multi-agent reinforcement learning and its applications. Here is my CV.
